title: 这是这个地区最好的房子

conversations.english: May I come in?
conversations.chinese: 我可以进来吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, Please do. Now let me show you the house.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，请进。现在让我给你看看房子。

title: 这间公寓的租金是多少

conversations.english: How many rooms are you looking for?
conversations.chinese: 你们想找多少个房间？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, four or five. How much is the rent for this apartment?
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，四或五。这间公寓的租金是多少？

conversations.english: I wonder if you could help me, I'm looking for a room.
conversations.chinese: 你可以帮我吗？我正在找一间房子。
conversations.reply_english: Well, I have got a vacancy.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我有一间空房。

conversations.english: Hello, May I help you?
conversations.chinese: 你好，我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, we're interested in seeing the rooms for rent.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我们有兴趣看看要出租的房间。

title: 在公司附近找一套公寓

conversations.english: Are you going home now?
conversations.chinese: 你现在要回家吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, I'm not.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，我不是。

title: 我们不允许携带猫或狗

conversations.english: Good morning. Do you have a small house for the 18th and 19th of this month?
conversations.chinese: 早上好。这个月18号、19号你们有一套小房子出租吗？
conversations.reply_english: Let me see...One or two bedrooms?
conversations.reply_chinese: 让我查查…一个房间还是两个房间？

conversations.english: Dick, I’ve decided not to rent that house.
conversations.chinese: 迪克，我已经决定不租那个房子了。
conversations.reply_english: But yesterday you said you would rent it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 但是昨天你说你会租的。

conversations.english: Do you take in students?
conversations.chinese: 你们接纳学生房客吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes.If you don’t mind sharing room,there’s one available.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。你若不嫌与人合住的话，现在就有一间。

conversations.english: Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'm looking for a house.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我在找一套房子？

conversations.english: Good morning! May I help you?
conversations.chinese: 早上好！我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. My wife and I are interested in renting a house for the summer.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。我和我的妻子这个夏天有兴趣租一套房子。

title: 下星期我有间房间可以空出来

conversations.english: A friend told me I might find a room here.
conversations.chinese: 有个朋友告诉我也许在这儿能找到一间住房。
conversations.reply_english: Yes.I’ll have a room free next week.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，下星期我有间房间可以腾出来。

title: 听说你这儿有空房间出租

conversations.english: I’ve been told you might have a vacant room.
conversations.chinese: 听说你这儿或许有空房间出租。
conversations.reply_english: Yes.I have a spare room.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我有一间房空着。

title: 我想租一间住房 Looking for a room

conversations.english: I wonder if you can help me.I’m looking for a room.
conversations.chinese: 不知你能否帮忙，我想找间住房。
conversations.reply_english: Yes.I’ve get a small room.
conversations.reply_chinese: 可以。我有一小间住房。

title: 找一个好地方住是很重要的

conversations.english: I really appreciate your driving me around.
conversations.chinese: 我真的很感谢你开车带我绕一绕。
conversations.reply_english: It's no problem.I have time today, and I think it's important that you find a good place.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没关系的。我今天有时间，我也认为你能找到一个好地方住是很重要的。

title: 我想有自己的私人空间

conversations.english: I need to find a new place to live.
conversations.chinese: 我要另找一个地方住。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah? Why? Don’t you like living with me?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是吗？为什么？你不喜欢和我一起住吗？

title: 我们需要找个房产中介

conversations.english: I think this spring is a good time for us to start looking.
conversations.chinese: 今年春天开始找房子是不错的时机。
conversations.reply_english: We should plan to move out of here before July.I'm tired of living in apartments.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们应该计划在七月前搬走。我已经厌倦住公寓了。

title: 下个星期我们会粉刷完

conversations.english: Hi, I’m Mary Smith.
conversations.chinese: 你好，我是玛丽·史密斯。
conversations.reply_english: Hello, I’m the landlord. John Taylor.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我是房东约翰·泰勒。

conversations.english: Hi, John.
conversations.chinese: 你好，约翰。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, hi, Mary, come on in. Any problem?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，你好，玛丽，进来。有什么问题吗？

conversations.english: This is a nice place, but you need to get some furniture.
conversations.chinese: 这地方不错，可你得弄些家具。
conversations.reply_english: I have some I can bring from our place, and there’s some more out at my parents’.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我住的地方可以搬一些过来，而且还有一些在我父母家里。

conversations.english: I've been told you might have a vacant room.
conversations.chinese: 我被告知您有一件空房。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I have a spare room.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我有一件空房。

title: 我的房子下个月就到期了

conversations.english: My lease ends next month, so I have to find a new place.
conversations.chinese: 我的房子下个月就到期了,我得找个新住处.
conversations.reply_english: I feel sorry for you. It's a jungle out there.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真替你难过.现在很难租到房子的.

title: 询问你们打广告的公寓

conversations.english: Hello. I am calling about the apartment you advertised.
conversations.chinese: 您好。我打电话是来询问你们打广告的公寓。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, what kind of apartment are you interested in?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。您对哪种公寓有兴趣？

conversations.english: Let’s move out of here. This apartment is too small.
conversations.chinese: 我们搬开这个地方吧。这间公寓太小了。
conversations.reply_english: I agree. I’ll look in the paper.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我赞同。我去看一下报纸。

conversations.english: Hello?This is John Smith.Can I speak to Mr．White，please?
conversations.chinese: 喂?我是约翰．史密斯。能请王先生听电话吗?
conversations.reply_english: This is Mr．White speaking．
conversations.reply_chinese: 我就是王先生。

title: 在这个区我找到一个好房子

conversations.english: I've found a nice place in this district.Three bedrooms,a large kitchen,high ceilings,a tile bath and a big drawing room.
conversations.chinese: 在这个区我找到一个好地方.三居室,厨房很大,屋顶很高,瓷砖装修的洗澡间,还有一个大客厅。
conversations.reply_english: It sounds nice,but don't forget this is a seedy,run-down neighborhood.
conversations.reply_chinese: 听起来不错,但是别忘了周围都是破旧肮脏的房舍

title: 想看看你要出租的房子

conversations.english: Hello,may I help you?
conversations.chinese: 你好，能帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes.We're interested in seeing the rooms for rent.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我们很想看看你要出租的房子。

conversations.english: My dear,it's five flights up!
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，要爬上五段楼梯呀！
conversations.reply_english: That's all right.We'll get used to it.Besides,it is quiet up there.We're little further away from the street and traffic noise and there's no one living over us.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没关系,我们会适应的.此外高处很安静,我们远离街道，听不到交通噪音，上边还没有人居住。

conversations.english: This is a very spacious apartment. It's forty pings, including the parking space. That's about one thousand four hundred square feet.
conversations.chinese: 这间公寓很宽敞。含停车位四十坪。大约 是一千四百平方英尺。
conversations.reply_english: Wow. It's just the two of us. I don't know if we need that much room.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哇。我们只有两个人。我不确定我们需要那么大的空间。

conversations.english: But this place doesn't feel like a forty-ping apartment.
conversations.chinese: 不过这间公寓不像有四十坪大。
conversations.reply_english: Well, it's forty pings including the balcony. See. It's huge.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，四十坪还包括阳台在内。看。很大吧。

conversations.english: I'm in heaven! A Whirlpool dryer!
conversations.chinese: 我到天堂了！惠而浦的干衣机！
conversations.reply_english: I love them, too. Let's move into the kitchen. Wait until you see the refrigerator.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也很喜欢。我们去厨房吧。等看到冰箱，你会更兴奋。

title: 感激你让我们承租这间公寓

conversations.english: Hello, Mr. Gao. We appreciate your letting us have the apartment.
conversations.chinese: 哈啰，高先生。我们很感激你让我们承租这间公寓。
conversations.reply_english: My pleasure. You're a sweet couple. Do you have any questions?
conversations.reply_chinese: 荣幸之至。你们这对夫妇人很好。有任何问题吗？

conversations.english: That's really convenient. We were wondering if you could take a little off the rent, though.
conversations.chinese: 那样真方便。不过我们想知道你房租可不可以降一点。
conversations.reply_english: I can take two thousand off. That'll make the rent twenty-eight thousand.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我可以减个两千元。那样就是二万八千元。

conversations.english: So how long do you plan to live here?
conversations.chinese: 所以你们准备在这住多久？
conversations.reply_english: We'd like to sign a year-long contract, if that's OK.
conversations.reply_chinese: 如果可以的话，我们想签一年的约.

conversations.english: So the apartment comes unfurnished?
conversations.chinese: 所以这间公寓不附家具？
conversations.reply_english: This one is. I have another one that's furnished, but I'm not sure you'll like the furniture.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这间没有。我还有一间有附家具，不过我不确定你们会喜欢那些家具。

conversations.english: Sorry to bother you so early. There's another couple who wants to rent the apartment, but I thought I'd ask you first.
conversations.chinese: 很抱歉这么早打扰你。有另一对夫妻想要租这间公寓，不过我觉得该先问你们.
conversations.reply_english: That's so sweet of you. We definitely want it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你真是太好心了。我们当然想租。

conversations.english: You bet it is. And we got four thousand for our car space! Awesome!
conversations.chinese: 一点也没错。而且我们的车位以四千元租出去了！太棒了！
conversations.reply_english: Let's play some music! I feel like dancing.
conversations.reply_chinese: 来放点音乐吧！我想跳舞。

conversations.english: What happened?
conversations.chinese: 发生什么事了？
conversations.reply_english: That’s it, my lease is up. I have to move.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我的租期到期了，我必须搬出去。

title: 我在考虑买一个二手房

conversations.english: Ant Shirley, it's being years since we last met. How were you doing in the passing years?
conversations.chinese: 雪莉阿姨，好多年没有见了。这些年您怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Pretty well. What about you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 挺好的。你呢？

title: 真难以相信纽约的房价

conversations.english: I can’t believe the cost of apartments in New York City.
conversations.chinese: 我真难以相信纽约市的房价。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, you didn’t know that apartments here are considered valuable, even if they are small and crowded?
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，你难道不知道这里的公寓虽然很小、很挤，但还是很值钱吗？
